title: What is the tennis schedule in Hamburg & Geneva?
description: Some of the biggest stars on the ATP Tour will be in action Thursday across the Bitpanda Hamburg Open and the Gonet Geneva Open. Andrey Rublev and Felix Auger-Aliassime are in action in Hamburg, while Novak Djokovic and top seed Taylor Fritz will compete in Geneva. View the full Thursday order of play for Hamburg and Geneva below. ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 22 MAY 2025 BITPANDA HAMBURG OPEN Centre Court - start 12:00 Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) vs Jiri Lehecka (CZE) Flavio Cobolli (ITA) vs Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP) Not Before 15:30 [3] Andrey Rublev vs Luciano Darderi (ITA) or [7] Brandon Nakashima (USA) Not Before 18:00 Alexandre Muller (FRA) vs [6] Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN) M1 - start 12:00 [Q] Sander Arends (NED) / Luke Johnson (GBR) vs Andres Molteni (ARG) / Fernando Romboli (BRA) [1] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) vs [WC] Justin Engel (GER) / Max Hans Rehberg (GER) Jamie Murray (GBR) / Rajeev Ram (USA) vs Julian Cash (GBR) / Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) or [3] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA) Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) vs Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA) or [2] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER)  GONET GENEVA OPEN Center Court - start 11:30 Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) vs Guido Andreozzi (ARG) / Theo Arribage (FRA) Not Before 13:30 [4] Karen Khachanov vs [Q] Sebastian Ofner (AUT) [1] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs [6] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) Not Before 18:00 [8] Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) vs [2] Novak Djokovic (SRB) [5] Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs [Q] Cameron Norrie (GBR) or [3] Tomas Machac (CZE) Court 1 - start 11:30 Quentin Halys (FRA) / Albano Olivetti (FRA) vs Jakob Schnaitter (GER) / Mark Wallner (GER) [3] Matthew Ebden (AUS) / John Peers (AUS) vs Francisco Cabral (POR) / Lucas Miedler (AUT) [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Ariel Behar (URU) / Joran Vliegen (BEL)  [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Some of the biggest stars on the ATP Tour will be in action Wednesday across the Bitpanda Hamburg Open and the Gonet Geneva Open. Top seed Alexander Zverev will continue his pursuit of a home title against Alexandre Muller, while Novak Djokovic and top seed Taylor Fritz will compete in Geneva.

Tournament News

View full Thursday order of play

May 21, 2025

Witters

The Bitpanda Hamburg Open is an ATP 500 event in Germany. By ATP Staff

Some of the biggest stars on the ATP Tour will be in action Thursday across the Bitpanda Hamburg Open and the Gonet Geneva Open.

Andrey Rublev and Felix Auger-Aliassime are in action in Hamburg, while Novak Djokovic and top seed Taylor Fritz will compete in Geneva.

View the full Thursday order of play for Hamburg and Geneva below.

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 22 MAY 2025

BITPANDA HAMBURG OPEN
Centre Court - start 12:00
Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) vs Jiri Lehecka (CZE)
Flavio Cobolli (ITA) vs Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP)

Not Before 15:30
[3] Andrey Rublev vs Luciano Darderi (ITA) or [7] Brandon Nakashima (USA)

Not Before 18:00
Alexandre Muller (FRA) vs [6] Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN)

M1 - start 12:00
[Q] Sander Arends (NED) / Luke Johnson (GBR) vs Andres Molteni (ARG) / Fernando Romboli (BRA)
[1] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) vs [WC] Justin Engel (GER) / Max Hans Rehberg (GER)
Jamie Murray (GBR) / Rajeev Ram (USA) vs Julian Cash (GBR) / Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) or [3] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA)
Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) vs Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA) or [2] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER)

GONET GENEVA OPEN
Center Court - start 11:30
Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) vs Guido Andreozzi (ARG) / Theo Arribage (FRA)

Not Before 13:30
[4] Karen Khachanov vs [Q] Sebastian Ofner (AUT)
[1] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs [6] Hubert Hurkacz (POL)

Not Before 18:00
[8] Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) vs [2] Novak Djokovic (SRB)
[5] Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs [Q] Cameron Norrie (GBR) or [3] Tomas Machac (CZE)

Court 1 - start 11:30

Quentin Halys (FRA) / Albano Olivetti (FRA) vs Jakob Schnaitter (GER) / Mark Wallner (GER)
[3] Matthew Ebden (AUS) / John Peers (AUS) vs Francisco Cabral (POR) / Lucas Miedler (AUT)
[1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Ariel Behar (URU) / Joran Vliegen (BEL)
